settings.html:
<!--样式代码Start-->
<style>
/* 通用样式-Start */
/* 产品描述Tab间距 */
.tabs-nav__item-list {
gap: 5% !important;
}
/* 列表符号大小调整 */
::marker {
font-size: var(--base-font-size) !important;
}
/* 修改分行属性 */
p {
word-break: break-word;
}

/* 调整博客梗概两端对齐 */
.article-item__excerpt.text--small {
text-align: justify;
}

/* 调整Tidio高度 */
iframe#tidio-chat-iframe {
min-height: 115px;
padding-bottom: 21px;
}

/* 隐藏Sould Out标签 */
span.label.label--subdued {
display: none;
}

/* 修改横幅高度间距和圆角 */
.announcement-bar__message {
padding-top: 5px;
padding-bottom: 5px;
}

.announcement-bar__content-inner {
border-radius: 0;
}

/* 修改Header间距 */
.header__wrapper {
padding: 10px 0;
}

/* 修改PC端导航栏Linklist字体大小 */
.header__linklist-link {
font-size: larger;
}

/* 修改Header Icon大小 */
.header__icon-wrapper svg {
width: 22px;
height: 22px;
}

/* 取消Drop down链接点击*/
li.header__linklist-item.has-dropdown a.header__linklist-link.link--animated {
pointer-events: none;
}

/* 修改面包屑字体大小 */
.breadcrumb__list {
font-size: larger;
}

/* 修改按钮样式 */
/* 取消按钮阴影 */
.button,
.shopify-challenge__button,
.shopify-payment-button__button,
#shopify-product-reviews .spr-summary-actions-newreview,
#shopify-product-reviews .spr-button,
{
background-image: none !important
}

/* 修改按钮颜色 */
.button--secondary,
.button--outline {
--button-background: var(--primary-button-background) !important;
--button-text-color: var(--primary-button-text-color) !important;
border: 0 !important
}

/* 添加Hover样式 */
.button--primary:hover,
.button--secondary:hover,
.button--outline:hover {
--button-background: var(--secondary-button-background) !important;
--button-text-color: var(--secondary-button-text-color) !important
}

/* 取消移动端侧边栏弹窗圆角 */
.popover__header {
border-radius: 0 !important;
}

/* 取消Description模块图片间距 */
.text-container img:not([style*="float"]),
.rte img:not([style*="float"]) {
display: unset;
margin: 0;
}

/* 修复Klaviyo新用户侧边Tab大小 */
span.needsclick.go681896951.kl-private-reset-css-Xuajs1 {
min-height: auto !important;
padding: unset !important;
}

/* 修改按钮大小写 */
button,
.button {
text-transform: capitalize !important;
}

/* 修改购物车弹窗产品推荐模块背景色 */
.mini-cart__recommendations-inner {
background: rgb(var(--background)) !important;
}

/* 通用样式-End */
/*==========*/
/* 功能样式-Start */
/* PC/M端内容分别展示 */
@media not (min-width: 768px) {
.pc-description {
display: none;
}
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
.m-description {
display: none;
}
}

/* 功能样式-End */
/*==========*/
/* M样式-Start */
@media not screen and (min-width: 768px) {
/* 移动端Footer分栏显示 */
.footer {
padding-top: 1em;
}

footer .container {
padding: 0 10px;
}
p.footer__item-title.heading {
padding-top: 1em;
margin-bottom: 0.23em;
font-size: 15px !important;
}

.footer__item-list {
/* display: block;  */
gap: 0px;
}

li.linklist__item {
padding-top: 0.2em !important;
}
a.link--faded {
line-height: 1.2em;
}
}
/* M样式-End */
</style>
<!--样式代码End-->

settings.text: Black Friday & Cyber Monday Deals Live
settings.content:
Black Friday & Cyber Monday are the perfect time to grab a Unihertz smartphone at the year's lowest price. Don't miss out on this golden opportunity to own a UNIQUE smartphone just as UNIQUE as you are!

* Save up to $150 OFF on selected models
* Ends on December 3

settings.text: Eligible Free Shipping Available on Order Over $99.99
settings.content:
Free Shipping to the USA, Germany & Japan
On Order Over $99.99

* Not Covering Replacement Parts

No delivery from 9/29 to 10/08 due to the national holidays. 

*Orders during the period will be processed starting on 10/09.
